changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.log_modified_product_status_code_sequencing() RETURNS trigger AS 'com.chiralbehaviors.CoRE.meta.models.JobModelImpl.log_modified_product_status_code_sequencing' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.log_modified_product_status_code_sequencing() OWNER TO core;
